name: Gulper.Io
summary: Welcome to gulper.io, a modern mix of the classic snake and Tron lightcycles games, but against real players this time. It runs directly in your browser, so you don't need to download anything - just enter your nickname and play! In this game you control a slithering snake, or worm, or whatever you call it; your goal is to collect as much energy as possible and don't let others stop you! Avoid collisions, be smart with your strategy, team with other players, and make your way to the top of the global leaderboard!
